desc: Every purchase donates to our mental health charity. Made for anyone going through something difficult like the loss of a loved one, a break up, or depression/anxiety. Each necklace comes with an interchangeable coin holder and a coin with a word etched on it. Includes 1 extra coin to give to a loved one.

layout.text: WHAT YOU SAY IS WHAT YOU BECOME

PICK YOUR WORD.
MANIFEST IT.
SHARE WITH OTHERS.
